snippet: James E. Hansen, a longtime NASA scientist, retires this week and plans to pursue even greater political and legal efforts to limit greenhouse gases.
abstract: James E Hansen, climate scientist who issued clearest warnings of 20th century about dangers of global warming, plans to retire from the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to pursue political and legal campaign to limit greenhouse gases; departure will deprive federally-sponsored climate research of its best-known public figure but will allow Hansen to press his cause in court.
lead_paragraph: James E. Hansen, a longtime NASA scientist, retires this week and plans to pursue even greater political and legal efforts to limit greenhouse gases.

headline.seo: James E. Hansen Retiring From NASA to Fight Global Warming
headline.main: Climate Maverick to Retire From NASA
